channel.title: Rune C Bow help!
channel.description: Ok, I made rune c bow hit like a cross bow. When I attack npcs with it, I hit pretty high. ( 30s-40s ). But, when I attack players with it, My max is only like 20? I searched if(usebow) in client.java, and changed hitdiff to 50, but after i compile and turn on the server, every other range item can hit up to 50 too. I only want rune c bow to hit up to 50. Any Help?

item.title: Rune C Bow help!
item.dc:creator: @k1ngj4m3z k1ngj4m3z
item.description:
@k1ngj4m3z wrote:

Ok, I made rune c bow hit like a cross bow. When I attack npcs with it, I hit pretty high. ( 30s-40s ). But, when I attack players with it, My max is only like 20? I searched if(usebow) in client.java, and changed hitdiff to 50, but after i compile and turn on the server, every other range item can hit up to 50 too. I only want rune c bow to hit up to 50. Any Help?

Read full topic
